title: Breaking the Big 4 Lockdown: Can Any ‘Other’ Rider Win a Grand Tour in 2025?
content:
Opinion: The 'super team' stanglehold on grand tour racing means only superdomestiques have a chance at breaking the Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel, Roglič lockout.

Read the full article at Breaking the Big 4 Lockdown: Can Any ‘Other’ Rider Win a Grand Tour in 2025? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
